Dublin is the capital city of Ireland, located on the country’s east coast where the River Liffey flows into the sea. ðŸŒŠ It’s the largest city in Ireland and has been the country’s most important city for hundreds of years! ðŸ™ï¸

Where Is Dublin? ðŸ“ #

Dublin sits near the middle of Ireland’s eastern coastline. It’s like the heart of Ireland, with many important roads and railways connecting it to other parts of the country. ðŸš‚ The beautiful River Liffey runs right through the middle of the city before emptying into the Irish Sea. ðŸŒŠ

item.title: 003. Stockholm

Stockholm, Sweden #

Stockholm is a beautiful city that sits on a collection of islands in Sweden. It’s the capital and largest city of Sweden, located in Northern Europe. Stockholm is a special place with lots of fascinating history, delicious food, and exciting things to see and do! ðŸŒŸ

Where in the World is Stockholm? ðŸŒ #

Stockholm is located in Sweden, which is part of Scandinavia in Northern Europe. The city sits at a special spot where Lake MÃ¤laren meets the Baltic Sea. What makes Stockholm super cool is that it’s built across 14 different islands that are all connected by 57 bridges! ðŸŒ‰ The exact location of Stockholm is 59.334591Â° north and 18.063240Â° east on your globe or map. This unique island layout gives Stockholm the nickname “Beauty on Water.” ðŸ’§

Seoul is the capital city of South Korea, a fascinating country in East Asia ðŸŒ. This vibrant city is full of interesting sights ðŸŒŸ, delicious food ðŸ², and amazing people!

Where Is Seoul? ðŸ“ #

Seoul is located in the northwestern part of South Korea, quite close to the border with North Korea ðŸ—ºï¸. It sits along the Han River ðŸžï¸, which divides the city into two halves. If you look at a map, you can find Seoul at these coordinates: 37.532600, 127.024612.

New York City, USA #

New York City, also known as NYC or “The Big Apple,” is a fascinating place full of skyscrapers ðŸ™ï¸, exciting attractions ðŸŽ¡, and diverse people. It’s one of the most famous cities in the world and has lots to discover! ðŸŒ

Where is New York City? ðŸ“ #

New York City is located in the northeastern part of the United States ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸, at the southern tip of New York State. The city sits where the Hudson and East rivers meet New York Bay ðŸŒŠ, creating one of the world’s largest natural harbors. The city is made up of five areas called boroughs: Manhattan, Brooklyn, the Bronx, Queens, and Staten Island. Most of New York City is actually built on three islands ðŸï¸ - Manhattan, Staten Island, and western Long Island.

florence, italy #

Florence is a beautiful historic city located in north-central Italy, in a region called Tuscany. Let’s explore this amazing place that’s full of art, history, and delicious food! ðŸŽ¨ðŸ

Where is Florence? ðŸ“ #

Florence sits on the banks of the River Arno, surrounded by pretty hills. It’s about 160 feet above sea level and serves as the capital city of Tuscany. If you look at a map of Italy, you’ll find Florence about 65 miles south of Bologna and 190 miles southeast of Milan. The city has coordinates of 43.769562, 11.255814, which are like its special address on Earth! ðŸŒðŸ—ºï¸

Where in the World is Reykjavik? ðŸŒ #

Reykjavik is located in the southwestern part of Iceland, sitting on the shores of FaxaflÃ³i bay ðŸŒŠ. item.title: 009. Singapore

Singapore, Singapore #

Singapore is a small island city-state located in Southeast Asia, right at the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula. Even though it’s one of the 20 smallest countries in the world, Singapore is packed with amazing things to see and do! ðŸŒâœ¨

Where Is It? ðŸ“ #

Singapore sits just 85 miles north of the Equator and consists of one main diamond-shaped island plus about 60 tiny islets. It’s separated from Malaysia by the Straits of Johor to the north and from Indonesia by the Singapore Strait to the south. ðŸŒŠðŸ—ºï¸
